resources.string: This SOS button is for sending safety message to added contact numbers with define or pre-defined message in setable time duration with current location!
This SOS button is for sending critical situation message to added contact numbers with define or pre-defined message in setable time duration with current location!
This SOS button is for sending trouble (for help) message to added contact numbers with define or pre-defined message in setable time duration with current location!

Try to add widget on home sreen from widget store into smart phone Then set the message, contacts and time duration in setting page. Enable data for internet Enable GPS (Check all the check box of Location Service in settings menu)
